document_data.name: ''Darkdust''
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite dragon/256/Bazaar of the Bizarre: Tools of the Trade|91}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Darkdust''''' was a variety of enchanted powder that could impede a foe's vision{{Cite dragon/256/Bazaar of the Bizarre: Tools of the Trade|90}}
document_data.Description: This powder resembled coarse [[sand]] and was gray in coloration. It was typically contained within small black bags or [[pouch]]es, with enough of the substance for one to three doses.
document_data.Powers:
''Darkdust'' could only affect creatures that were living [[humanoid]]s of {{SIrange|4|8|ft|long=yes}} in height. When thrown at such a target, the creature would be completely enveloped in a cloud of inky blackness. If the powder's magic was resisted, the target would only be afflicted with temporary blindness.

The effect of ''darkdust'' could be negated by the ''[[cure blindness]]'' [[spell]].
document_data.Notable Owners: Most guilds in the Dalelands possessed one or more pouches of ''darkdust''.
